description: The last time we saw Giovanni Matrix he was serving up a total-top experience to the hungry hole of Javi Velaro. But there was something about Logan Rogue that gave Giovanni the itch to submit his ass and take a pounding. Logan loves getting fucked, but rest assured he can give it just as well as he can take it. Giovanni holds onto Logan tight at 11:50 as he gets his butt pumped. Giovanni later returns the experience and gives it to Logan -- check out 22:05 to see some of the ass-flexing action!
title: Giovanni Matrix Bottoms And Tops With Logan Rogue
